After regitration ou will be requested to provide supporting documents proving that you belong to one or more of the following Horizon 2020 categories:
‚Äònatural person‚Äô, private or public body‚Äô, ‚Äònon-profit
organisation‚Äô, ‚Äòsecondary or higher education establishment‚Äô, ‚Äòinternational organisation‚Äô  or ‚Äòinternational organisation of Europe an interest‚Äô.
The status ‚Äòresearch organisation‚Äô validation is based on a self-declaration.

This is about supporting documents to be provided for registering an organisation to participate in H2020 and FP7 Calls.
